Name: Barrel Roll (Supreme)

Description: When the character performs the Brace maneuver, the benefits apply to all allies within short range.

Name: Consider our Options
Description: Take the Consider Our Options action. make a [B]Hard (:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210) Negotiation check.[b] Until the character's next turn, a character who attacks them first suffers 2 strain, plus 1 strain per :success:1279760614994087987:success:1279760614994087987 on the character's check.

Name: Consider our Options (Improved)
Description: Allies within short range may also benefit from Consider Our Options

Name: Exceed Specifications
Description: When making a check using an item, may add :boost:1279760567694790707. The GM may spend :threat:1279760886906490960:threat:1279760886906490960 on the check to damage the item one step, or :despair:1279760580332355607 to damage it beyond usability.

Name: Exceed Specifications (Improved)
Description: When the character takes the Exceed Specifications incidental, upgrade the ability of the check once instead of the standard effect.

Name: Exceed Specifications (Supreme)
Description: If a check beneffitting from Exceed Specifications generates :triumph-1:1279760921266360471, may damage the item to roll additional :proficiency:1279760961695256718 and add it to the check results.  If the check generates :despair:1279760580332355607, add :challenge:1279760574699278406 to the check results.

Name: Fire Support
Description: After the character makes a successful combat check using a vehicle weapon, the next ally to make a check adds :boost:1279760567694790707 equal to ranks in Fire Support.

Name: Fire When Ready
Description: As an action, make a [B]Hard (:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210) Leadership check.[b] Choose a number of crew equal to Presence who downgrade the difficulty of their next Gunnery check once, plus once per additional :success:1279760614994087987:success:1279760614994087987.

Name: For the Republic!
Description: When an ally is incapacitated or killed, the character can make a [B]Daunting (:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210) Leadership check.[b] If successful, the ally is not defeated until the end of the following round.

Name: First Among Brothers
Description: When the character makes a check that does not generate any :threat:1279760886906490960, the check gains :advantage:1279760566587490314 equal to ranks in First Among Brothers.  The character may only spend these additional :advantage:1279760566587490314 to affect allied clones.

Name: Guardian of the Republic
Description: After the character uses Parry or Reflect to reduce damage from a hit against an ally, that ally cannot be targeted by combat checks for the rest of the round.

Name: Hyperspace Assault
Description: The character may use Astrogation or Knowledge (Warfare) to determine initiative during an encounter in which they are piloting or commanding a starship and may spend :triumph-1:1279760921266360471 from the check to choose the starting location of allies.

Name: Identify Ingredients
Description: After being exposed to a substance, as an out-of-turn incidental, may roll :force:1279761086429659146 no greater than Force rating. Spend :force:1279761086429659146:force:1279761086429659146 to immediately identify its composition and effects.

Name: Incite Distraction
Description: While in a crowd, may perform the Incite Distraction action to make an [B]Average (:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210) Deception check[b]. If successful, enemies treat the area as difficult terrain. The character may spend :triumph-1:1279760921266360471 to make the location impassable terrain to them instead.

Name: Inside Knowledge
Description: Once per session while in an enemy facility or vessel, may perform the Inside Knowledge action, make a [B]Hard (:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210) Skulduggery check[b]. Character may then find a single personal scale item with a rarity no greater than Cunning plus 2 previously stashed here, or gain a narrative benefit.

Name: Inside Person
Description: Once per session the character may spend a Destiny Point to establish he has been undercover in an identified enemy base or large vehicle. For the remainder of the session, add automatic :advantage:1279760566587490314:advantage:1279760566587490314 to checks he or his allies make that are associated with that location.

Name: Know Their Weakness
Description: Once per session, may perform the Know Their Weakness action and choose one target within close range; make a [B]Hard (:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210) Perception check[b] to downgrade the difficulty of social skill checks against target once per rank of Know Their Weakness until the end of the session.

Name: In The Know
Description: Remove :setback:1279761015474753570 up to ranks of In the Know from checks to get information from people or dissemenate news. Minion NPCs do not realize this character's allegiance in interviews.

Name: Learning Opportunity
Description: Once per round, the character may spend :advantage:1279760566587490314:advantage:1279760566587490314:advantage:1279760566587490314 on a check they fail to upgrade the ability of their next check once.

Name: Leverage
Description: The character removes :setback:1279761015474753570 per rank of Leverage from their Cool and Negotiation checks.

Name: Mission Critical
Description: Once per session after rolling a Piloting check, but before resolving it, the character may spend a Destiny Point to add :success:1279760614994087987 or :advantage:1279760566587490314 to the results equal to their ranks in that skill.

Name: On My Order
Description: As an action, make a [B]Hard (:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210) Leadership check[b]. Choose a number of crew equal to Presence, who upgrade the ability of their next Gunnery check once plus once per additional :success:1279760614994087987:success:1279760614994087987.

Name: Outmaneuver
Description: As an action, make a [B]Hard (:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210) Knowledge (Warfare) check. [b] Choose one ship or vehicle per :success:1279760614994087987. Until the end of the character's next turn, the chosen ships must perform one extra maneuver to move.

Name: Will of the Force
Description: Once per round after failing a skill check, the character may convert one dark side Destiny Point to a light side Destiny Point.

Name: Overwhelming Aura
Description: Commit :force:1279761086429659146. Add :advantage:1279760566587490314 to social checks equal to :force:1279761086429659146 committed. Add :threat:1279760886906490960 to equal :force:1279761086429659146 commited to enemy social checks in short range.

Name: Overwhelming Aura (Improved)
Description: Characters affected by Overwhelming Aura add automatic :failure:1279760586783326319 to fear checks the character causes and automatic :success:1279760614994087987 to fear checks not caused by the character.

Name: Renegade Form
Description: When the character purchases this talent, they choose one characteristic.  They may use this characteristic in place of Brawn when making Lightsaber checks.

Name: Resist Questioning (Improved)
Description: When one ally within short range is targeted by an opposed social skill check, the character may perform Resist Questioning to affect this check instead. If the check fails, may spend :despair:1279760580332355607 to indicate the ally provided false information to foe.

Name: Resist Questioning
Description: When targeted by an opposed social skill check, the character may suffer 2 strain to perform the Resist Questioning out-of-turn incidental, adding :setback:1279761015474753570 to the check. If the check fails, may spend :despair:1279760580332355607 to indicate he has provided false information to foe.

Name: Respected Delegate
Description: Downgrade the difficulty of social skill checks made to interact with government institutions outside of homeworld a number of times equal to ranks in Respected Delegate.

Name: Scrap 'Em! (Improved)
Description: Scrap 'em! affects twice the number of allies, and allies add :boost:1279760567694790707:boost:1279760567694790707 to combat checks against the target.

Name: Secret Lore
Description: Remove :setback:1279761015474753570 per rank or Secret Lore from all Knowledge (Lore) checks. Reduce the difficulty of all Knowledge (Lore) checks by 1.

Name: Secrets of the Force
Description: Knowledge (Lore) and Lightsaber become career skills.

Name: Sincerest Flattery
Description: Once per encounter when the character makes a check using a skill that another character has previously used during the encounter, they add :boost:1279760567694790707:boost:1279760567694790707

Name: Something to Prove
Description: Once per session, suffer 4 strain to reroll a failed check.  If the check succeeds, the character heals 4 strain.

Name: Tactical Advance
Description: The character may suffer 2 strain to perform the Tactical Advance incidental.  Until the end of the character's next turn, the character and allies within short range may leave cover and continue to receive its benefits.

Name: Tactical Advance (Improved)
Description: The character may spend :advantage:1279760566587490314:advantage:1279760566587490314 from any check they make or :threat:1279760886906490960:threat:1279760886906490960 from a combat check targeting them to perform the tactical advance incidental without suffering strain.

Name: Temple Training
Description: Before making a Lightsaber skill check, the character may spend one Destiny Point to add damage to the attack equal to his ranks in Knowledge (Lore).

Name: Utility Belt (Improved)
Description: Once per session when the character performs a Utility Belt incidental, they may produce up to five functionally identical items.
